title: Vega Foundation Vision
summary: A modular blueprint for AI-driven narrative, context, and immersive audio with safety-first controls.

sections.heading: Mission
sections.content: Build modular, immersive experiences that merge AI, sound, and story.

sections.heading: Safety
sections.content: Keys and tokens are env-scoped. Configuration changes require admin tokens.

sections.heading: Engines
sections.content: Vision, Context, Storytelling, and Soundscapes run as modular services with tokenized admin control and autosync pipelines.

sections.heading: Roadmap
sections.content: Iterate fast with autosync hooks and live previews across Replit and GitHub.
